tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a great visit at Dr. Archana's clinic. They are following all the necessary precautions during these difficult COVID 19 times. I was so scared before entering. But after I reached there, and underwent my treatment. I was so relieved and satisfied. Would highly recommend everyone in case you facing any dental issues, go ahead and get your self treated without any fear great as all precautions are being taken by Dr. Archana. She's very calm and patient to deal with her patients. Thanks doctor.
reply_text:
Thanks a lot for your valuable feedback.
Our team would  continue to put in all efforts to provide you with the best treatment.
.
Regards
Bliss: A Child and dental clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited second time for RCT, procedure was performed with perfection , painless and relived me of severe pain instantly. Absolute friendly and experienced , highly recommended for treatment of any type dental problems. 

Waiting time with appointment was less than 5 minutes, shows efficient handling of patients visiting with appointments within alloted time slots.

In a nutshell one of the best treatment i had.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was my first time that I had to visit to dentist. Although the experience was good doctor made me understand what exactly the problem I am going through and what it could be in future, everything I want to know. Now I could say whenever I have any concern about my teeth I can visit to her without any hesitation.
reply_text:
Thanks for your valuable feedback.we will continue to provide you with quality
 health care.
Regards
Bliss team

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Not satisfied with the consultation. *** ** *** *********** ** ******** **** *** ****** ********** She charges 500 Rs for the consultation irrespective of her consultation charges 300 Rs which was written in her clinic. Moreover she did not check our kid and provide us with the information ***** *** ** ******** So a big no.
reply_text:
1-kindly check the consultation charges mentioned on the platform you writing this complaint as well as the reception desk
2-your child who is just one plus cannot be checked better than that due to his age .And was given apt advice to under GA for any procedure .... please get counter checked with another dentist before writing on an open platform just because you have a right to write anything.
Regards
Bliss

review:
500 rs is consultancy charged 700 for pasting of 3 teath bridge since this was not made by her so charged pasting charges. 
******* **** *** ******* ** ****** ** **** ** ***** ***** ***** **** ** ****** *** ***** 700 +500 charged which is not fair practice I will definitely not recommend to any one for  this clinic.
reply_text:
Definitely sir...I regard your opinion...you have every right to feel overcharged...
Firstly it's was a four unit case
Secondly..the bottles of 3M company cost way more than just 1000 bugs as quoted by you.
Thirdly, definitely I have not done your case at first place .. ideally it's your dentist's duty to fix it for you till number of years she has given you the guarantee for... normally we advice the patient to visit his/her own dentist at first place
I was helping you out during covid times as your doctor was not available.
So for me you are a new patient and so OPD has to be charged . because these days we cannot do a patient without proper PPE kit(for your safety) which has additional charges..
I'm extremely sorry if you felt that way...but I cudnt help you out in that.
Regards
Bliss

review: Doctor treats very friendly. You feel very comfortable but for filling of 3 teeths n costing 1500 each feels expensive, apart from that before meeting doctor you ve to deposite sum of 500 rupees in the reception with 360 rupees medicine.
